title: Addresses and Proceedings
title-note: National Education Association of the United States, 1858-1925
additional-note: Note that some libraries include later volumes under this title. Our assertion that all content is in the public domain should only be read as applying up to our stated last issue date (as is also how our other serial records of this sort should be read).
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
